altername_name: Necronomicon: El Alba de las Tinieblas
name: Necronomicon: The Dawning of Darkness
overview: 1927, United States, East Coast. William H. Stanton's life suddenly takes a terrifying turn for the worst. What horrific secret lies behind the mysterious occult experiments performed by the alchemist Herschel? The Necronomicon gives you the keys to the world of the deceased.
